Hi all --

Has anyone written a theme for TabControl using the Modern UI variables (or modified Modern UI for WPF directly) that I can liberate for a project? I tried writing one, but I'm a newb to authoring themes and I never saw my changes, so I assume I broke it somehow.

Thanks in advance for any replies.
ModernUI don't include theme for TabControl and TabItem. You can make your own. Using Expression Blend, you can make style more easy.
